title: A t-shirt for typophiles
content: It's not a font release, but I thought you folks enjoy this [custom-lettered piece](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414065458/http:/bit.ly/12rS7T8) I did for a t-shirt.
author: kosal

comments.content: Very nice! I hope Ms. Mipsum likes it.
